pr_title: extension point for WorkManager built on managed executors

timeline.message: Issue #14587 extension point for WorkManager built on managed executors

timeline.bodyText: can the ResourceInfo param be removed?
timeline.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: ResourceInfo cannot be removed because it includes information about the resource reference lookup that will be needed by the extension point. One example is that CommonJ has some requirements around the sharing attribute.
replies.author: njr-11

timeline.bodyText: Instead of re-declaring the service reference set/unset methods, you can set -dsannotations-inherit: true in the bnd.bnd
timeline.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: Nice, I'll look into switching to that option for this and some other pre-existing attributes that were following this pattern.  I'll make that improvement in a separate pull because this already has a successful build with all tests passing.
replies.author: njr-11
